This produces bland, PowerPoint-default aesthetics instead of distinctive, pedagogically effective visuals.

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation. No code execution, file access, network calls, or external commands. The SKILL.md file provides educational methodology for visual asset generation.

content.value_statement: Generic visuals with technical specs produce bland, PowerPoint-default aesthetics. This skill provides creative brief methodology that activates AI reasoning to generate distinctive, pedagogically effective visuals.
actual_capabilities: Creates strategic visual plans before generation
Writes narrative-driven creative briefs instead of technical specs
Aligns visual complexity with student proficiency levels
Validates prerequisites to prevent concept violations
Applies token conservation in batch mode
Prevents duplicate visual patterns across chapters
limitations: No file system access - cannot read existing chapter visuals
No direct image generation - requires image-generator skill
Does not execute code or run external commands
Assumes access to chapter documentation files

use_cases.title: Create Teaching Visuals
use_cases.description: Generate pedagogically aligned visuals for educational content with proper complexity gates

use_cases.title: Visual Story Planning
use_cases.description: Plan distinctive visual narratives using creative briefs that activate AI reasoning

use_cases.title: Proficiency-Aligned Graphics
use_cases.description: Create visuals matched to student skill levels from beginner to advanced

prompt_templates.title: Plan Visual Request
prompt_templates.prompt: Review chapter-index.md and chapter README.md. Identify proficiency level (A2/B1/C2) and prerequisites. Output strategic plan for visual assets before proceeding.

prompt_templates.title: Creative Brief Template
prompt_templates.prompt: Create creative brief with: The Story (1-2 sentence narrative), Emotional Intent (what it should feel like), Visual Metaphor (universal concept), Key Insight (one thing students must grasp), Color Semantics with hex codes, Pedagogical Reasoning.

prompt_templates.title: Proficiency Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Review proposed visual complexity against proficiency level. For A2: max 5-7 elements, <5 second grasp, static only. Flag any violations before proceeding.

prompt_templates.title: Duplicate Prevention
prompt_templates.prompt: Check existing visual patterns in chapter directory. List all PNG files and corresponding prompt files. Ensure new visual uses distinct type, metaphor, and structure from existing visuals.

output_examples.input: Create a visual showing compound interest growth
output: Story: A single seed multiplying into a vast orchard over time
Emotional Intent: Surprising magnitude of small choices over time
Visual Metaphor: Compound growth like a multiplication cascade
Key Insight: Small starting amounts compound dramatically
Color Semantics: Green (#16a34a) = growth and accumulation
Pedagogical Reasoning: Visual metaphor makes abstract math tangible

best_practices: Always read chapter documentation before creating visuals to understand context and prerequisites
Use narrative intent and metaphors instead of pixel specifications to activate AI reasoning
Validate proficiency-complexity alignment early to prevent wasted work
anti_patterns: Using pixel specifications like '44pt Roboto Bold at (50, 20)' kills AI reasoning
Skipping strategic planning phase leads to Chapter 9 failures
Assuming knowledge not in prerequisites violates pedagogical principles

faq.question: Which AI models work with this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Gemini 3, Claude, Codex, and any model that responds to text prompts.

faq.question: What proficiency levels are supported?
faq.answer: Three levels: A2 beginner (max 7 elements), B1 intermediate (max 10 elements), C2 professional (no artificial limits).

faq.question: Does this skill generate images directly?
faq.answer: No. This skill creates creative briefs and plans. Use with an image-generator skill for actual image creation.

faq.question: Is any data stored or transmitted?
faq.answer: No. This is a pure prompt methodology skill with no file, network, or data access.

faq.question: How does this differ from technical specifications?
faq.answer: Technical specs activate prediction mode for generic output. Creative briefs activate reasoning mode for distinctive visuals.

faq.question: Can I use this with other visual skills?
faq.answer: Yes. Use this skill for planning and prompt design, then pass creative briefs to image-generator skills.
